short_summary: Purchase of Laboratory and scientific equipment
description: THIS IS A SOLICITATION FOR THE PURCHASE OF ULTRA-LOW TEMPERATURE STAND-UP FREEZERS
full_summary:
### Ultra Low Temperature (ULT) Stand-Up Freezers

**Request for Proposal**
#### [RFP] Against Supply Arrangement

**Notice ID**: WS3800972779-Doc3815031147
**Publication Date**: January 10, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: February 20, 2023, 2:00 PM (EST)

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites interested Suppliers who hold a Supply Arrangement (SA) E60PV-19EQUI contract to submit a proposal for the purchase of Ultra Low Temperature (ULT) Stand-Up Freezers. The Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) is seeking to acquire 100 units of these freezers, with the option to purchase additional units during the contract period.

**Scope of Work**
The successful Supplier will be required to provide and install 100 ULT Stand-Up Freezers in Ottawa. The freezers must meet specific technical requirements outlined in the solicitation documents. Suppliers are responsible for ensuring that their bids are in compliance with all requirements outlined in the Supply Arrangement contract and the solicitation documents.

**Eligibility**
To be eligible to submit a proposal, Suppliers must currently hold a Supply Arrangement contract E60PV-19EQUI. Qualifying vendors will have been pre-qualified on this arrangement and will have received an invitation to bid. Suppliers not holding a valid Supply Arrangement contract will not be eligible to submit a bid.

**Trade Agreements and Regions**
This tender is subject to the following trade agreements: Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement, and Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership. The tender also includes delivery to the Canada region.

**Instructions and Additional Information**

*   Please refer to the solicitation documents for detailed information on the scope of work, eligibility requirements, and evaluation criteria.
*   The tender closing date is binding, and Suppliers are responsible for ensuring that their bids are received on time.
*   Suppliers with questions or concerns regarding this tender should contact Yessica Karnali at (yessicakarnali.wijayaputri@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

### Attachment
*   For best accessibility, please view this document in a modern internet browser.
*   No attachments are available for download.
